MS.S: Module to manage Hierarchical Configuration Data.

## [0.41.0-preview0002] - 2025-03-25_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added Pester tests for credential handling._x000D__x000A_- Added knockout support for basetype arrays._x000D__x000A_- Added cleanup of knockout items._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Adjusted integration tests for knockout of basetype array items and hashtables keys._x000D__x000A_- Updated build scripts to current version of Sampler (0.118.3-preview0001)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed `ConvertTo-Datum` always returns `$null` when DatumHandler returns `$false` (#139)_x000D__x000A_- Fixed PowerShell 7 compatibility of Copy-Object integration test._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Adjusted integration tests for knockout of basetype array items and hashtables keys_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed `ConvertTo-Datum` always returns `$null` when DatumHandler returns `$false` (#139)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed `Merge-DatumArray` does not return an array when merged array contains a single hashtable._x000D__x000A_- Fixed and extended tests for `Copy-Object`._x000D__x000A_- Fixed PowerShell 7 compatibility of Copy-Object integration test.
